name: Mundo Reader S.L.
goal:
Mundo Reader, S.L. (“BQ”), a Spanish company established in 2010 with its headquarters in Madrid and almost 900 employees based in Spain including more than 200 R&D engineers.
BQ is one of the top selling consumer electronics brands in Portugal and top 3 in Spain with products such as smartphones, tablets, e-readers, IoT, 3D printers and smart toys. It is important to point out that all our products are developed in Spain and some of them (3D printers and smart toys) are also assembled in Spain.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Telecom framework
Innovation and R&D framework
Free movement of goods and services
Competition in the mobile ecosystem
